body:
This issue duplicates from https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/98015

Briefly, plugin seems doesn't dispose flutter/dart resources properly, and after 15-30 minutes of active developing, adb losts connection to device, and I can't stop app without using ```killall -9 dart``` (SIGTERM won't help too)

For more information please see linked issue

Here is my ```flutter doctor --verbose```

 <details>
    <summary> Output </summary>


title: Flutter memory leak on Mac Air M1 Monterey [DUPLICATE]
